Rules of the system

    Flight loading

  • The algorithm is made to process by region.
  • This means that per region you have time to load the flight by 21:00 LT (depending on your geographic region).

    • Data processing

  • At 21:30 LT the algorithm calculates and updates the rank and the various statistics.

    • Log data errors or false log data

  • In case of log errors, the result will not be taken into consideration.
  • In case of manipulation or cheating, the pilot will be disqualified from the platform.
